pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
